channel.title: Not sure if this is server or client help
channel.description:
[code] Your server is now online. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3 at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:2135) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:548) at server.main(server.java:164) [/code]
I get that error when i try to run my server.

item.title: Not sure if this is server or client help
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

[quote=“Bmaw, post:1, topic:288297”] Your server is now online. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3 at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:2135) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:548) at server.main(server.java:164)

I get that error when i try to run my server.[/quote]

it’s most likely caused by a wrong format in your npc.cfg
did you check if all lines are seperated by tabs and not spaces?

Read full topic
item.source: Not sure if this is server or client help

item.title: Not sure if this is server or client help
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

If you’re Having Problems with you’re Client Post to this Section
If you’re Having Problems with you’re Source Post it to the Help Section

Uhm well all I can say is that you’re Source Ip isn’t Correct if its a “Put you’re Ip into the Files Server”
I usually get these all the time but I seem to fix them some how…

I just forget
I’ll message you on MSN if I remember

Read full topic

Sorry that was me lol my friend forgot to log out.
